api_list.name: Unmute Mix Audio
api_list.description:
**Brief description:**

- Unmute mix audio


**Request URL：**
- POST  `/commentator-backend/commentator/party/unmuteMixAudio` or `/commentator-backend/commentator/party/noLogin/unmuteMixAudio`


**Parameter:**

|Parameter name|Required|Type|Explain|
|:----    |:---|:----- |-----   |
| partyCode | Yes   | Number | party code |
| rtilCode  | Yes   | Number | rtil code |


 **Request example**

```
{
    "rtilCode": 18601,
    "partyCode": 725350985522
}
```


 **Return example**

```
{
    "errorInfo": "OK",
    "errorCode": "0x0",
    "result": null,
    "repeated": null
}
```
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://remote-commentator.p.rapidapi.com/commentator/party/noLogin/unmuteMixAudio"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "remote-commentator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

url = "https://remote-commentator.p.rapidapi.com/commentator/party/noLogin/unmuteMixAudio"

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "remote-commentator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Usage Page
api_list.description:
**Brief description:** 

- Usage Page


**Request URL：** 
- POST  `http://10.12.22.101/commentator-backend/admin/usagePage`


**Parameter:** 

|Parameter name|Required|Type|Explain|
|:----    |:---|:----- |-----   |
| pageNum      |  Yes   | int      | current page starts from 1 |
| pageSize     |  Yes   | int      | quantity per page|
|startTime |No  |long |start time |
|endTime |No  |long |end time |
|title |No  |String |title  128|
|email |No  |String |email|


 **Request example**

```
{
    "startTime" : 1608965449000,
    "endTime" : 1608965449300,
    "title" : "title",
	"email": "email"
}
```

        }

print(response.json())

api_list.name: List Region
api_list.description:
**Request URL：**

- POST `/event/listRegion`

## Parameters

| Parameter name | Required | Type   | Explain |
| :------------- | :------- | :----- | ------- |
| language       | Y        | String | "en"    |


## Examples

```json
{ "language": "en" }
```

_Response_

```json
{
  "errorInfo": "OK",
  "errorCode": "0x0",
  "result": [
    { "name": "Asia Pacific (Seoul)", "value": "ap-northeast-2" },
    { "name": "Asia Pacific (Mumbai)", "value": "ap-south-1" },
    { "name": "South America (SÃ£o Paulo)", "value": "sa-east-1" },
    { "name": "Europe (Paris)", "value": "eu-west-3" },
    { "name": "Europe (Frankfurt)", "value": "eu-central-1" },
    { "name": "Asia Pacific (Tokyo)", "value": "ap-northeast-1" },
    { "name": "US East (N. Virginia)", "value": "us-east-1" },
    { "name": "Asia Pacific (Sydney)", "value": "ap-southeast-2" },
    { "name": "US West (Oregon)", "value": "us-west-2" },
    { "name": "Middle East (Bahrain)", "value": "me-south-1" }
  ],
  "repeated": null
}
```

api_list.name: Get Device List
api_list.description:
**Request URL：**

- POST `/device/pageDevice`

## Parameters

- RequestHeader need Authorization token

- **Content-Type: application/json**

| Parameter name | Required | Type    | Explain                    |
| :------------- | :------- | :------ | -------------------------- |
| pageNum        | Y        | int     | page number, starting at 1 |
| pageSize       | Y        | int     | amount of data per page    |
| condition      | N        | String  | condition                  |
| living         | Y        | boolean | living                     |
| online         | Y        | boolean | online                     |
| offline        | Y        | boolean | offline                    |
| noCamera       | Y        | boolean | noCamera                   |
| receiver       | Y        | boolean | receiver                   |
| pack           | Y        | boolean | pack                       |
| anywhere       | Y        | boolean | anywhere                   |
| gridPack       | Y        | boolean | gridPack                   |
| gridSdi        | Y        | boolean | gridSdi                    |
| ext            | Y        | boolean | ext                        |

## Example

query Receiver list

```json
{
  "living": true,
  "online": true,
  "offline": true,
  "noCamera": true,
  "receiver": true
}
```

query X list

```json
{
  "living": true,
  "online": true,
  "offline": true,
  "noCamera": true,
  "gridSdi": true
}
```

_Response_

```json
{
  "errorInfo": "OK",
  "errorCode": "0x0",
  "result": {
    "total": 1,
    "list": [
      {
        "id": "e2d5941bba0e11ebaa5a000c29648d14",
        "name": "etan_Win_R2_Pack",
        "peerId": "3ba103589f120d120000000000000001",
        "type": "X",
        "status": "0",
        "ip": "",
        "port": "",
        "livePeerId": "",
        "livePeerName": null,
        "resourceId": "",
        "gridLivePeerId": null,
        "gridLivePeerName": null
      }
    ],
    "pageNum": 1,
    "pageSize": 20,
    "size": 20,
    "startRow": 0,
    "endRow": 0,
    "pages": 1,
    "prePage": 0,
    "nextPage": 0,
    "isFirstPage": false,
    "isLastPage": false,
    "hasPreviousPage": false,
    "hasNextPage": false,
    "navigatePages": 0,
    "navigatepageNums": null,
    "navigateFirstPage": 0,
    "navigateLastPage": 0,
    "firstPage": 0,
    "lastPage": 0
  },
  "repeated": null
}
```
api_list.code:

url = "https://remote-commentator.p.rapidapi.com/device/pageDevice"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "remote-commentator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Update Input Audio Track
api_list.description:
Update running event input aduio track

**Parameter:** 

|Parameter name|Required|Type|Explain|
|:----    |:---|:----- |-----   |
|eventId |Yes  |string | event id |
|inputAudioTracks |Yes  |InputAudioTrackp[] |end time |

InputAudioTrack

|field name|Required|Type|Explain|
|:----    |:---|:----- |-----   |
|trackIds |Yes  |int[] | use this audio track id  join party, get from audioCount/2, if audio count is 8, this could be on of the 1,2,3,4 |
|purpose |Yes  |int | mianIn or backupIn |

 **Request example**


```json
{
    "eventId": "69c0383ce07a4c6f92dbcc4ee2cc0f87",
    "inputAudioTracks": [
        {
            "trackIds": [
                3
            ],
            "purpose": 1
        },
        {
            "trackIds": [
                2
            ],
            "purpose": 2
        }
    ]
}
```



 **Return example**

```json
{
    "errorInfo": "OK",
    "errorCode": "0x0",
    "result": null,
    "repeated": null
}
```

```json
// Event not Running
{
    "errorCode": "82302012",
    "errorInfo": "Event not running",
    "result": null
}
```
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://remote-commentator.p.rapidapi.com/eventInput/updateInputAudioTrack"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "remote-commentator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Stop Event
api_list.description:
**Brief description:**

- Stop Event

**Request URL：**

- POST `/event/v2/stop/{id}`

**Path Variables:**

| Parameter name | Required | Type   | Explain |
| :------------- | :------- | :----- | ------- |
| id             | Yes      | String | eventId |

- Only if event status is 4，5，6，9 can call stop interface


**Return example**

```
{
    "errorCode": "0x0",
    "errorInfo": "Success",
    "result": null
}
```

api_list.name: Create Event
api_list.description:
**Request URL：**

- POST `/event/v2/create`

## Parameters

| Parameter name      | Required | Type    | Explain                                                |
| :------------------ | :------- | :------ | ------------------------------------------------------ |
| startTime           | Yes      | long    | start time                                             |
| endTime             | Yes      | long    | end time                                               |
| producerSettingsDto | Yes      | Object  | producer setting                                       |
| platfrom            | Yes      | String  | platfrom, 0 is Cloud event, 1 is TVU Transceiver event |
| title               | Yes      | String  | title, limit length: 32                                |
| description         | No       | String  | description, limit length: 300                         |
| record              | Yes      | Integer | record                                                 |
| eventInputDto       | Yes      | Array   | event inputs                                           |
| eventOutputDto      | Yes      | Array   | event outputs                                          |
| mainWindowType      | Yes      | Integer | main window type                                       |
| partyTitles         | Yes      | Array   | party titles                                           |

producerSettingsDto

| Parameter name     | Required    | Type         | Explain                                                       |
| :----------------- | :---------- | :----------- | ------------------------------------------------------------- |
| region             | Yes         | String       | VM region                                                     |
| format             | Yes         | String       | output format, 1080i5994                                      |
| elasticIp          | No          | String       | VM IP                                                         |
| delay              | Yes         | decimal      | Mix delay                                                     |
| isVertical         | No          | int(boolean) | vertical mode                                                 |
| rps                | No          | int(boolean) | rps feature                                                   |
| replay             | No          | int(boolean) | replay feature                                                |
| outputDelay        | No(boolean) | int          | output buffer                                                 |
| outputDelayTime    | No          | int          | output buffer time                                            |
| cloudRecord        | No          | int(boolean) | cloudRecord feature                                           |
| inputSourcesRecord | No          | String       | record whcih slot, example s1,s2,s3,s4,s5,s6,s7,s8,s9,s11,s12 |
| pgmRecording       | Yes         | int(boolean) | recording PGM                                                 |

**Event Name**

To set Remark, You need to set `title` attribute of request object. There are some limitations of `title`:

- Max length of `title` is 32.
- `title` can not be blank.
- `title` can not be same with other existd event.

**Start Time and End Time**

To set Start Time and End Time, You need to set `startTime` attribute and `EndTime` attribute of request object. The value of `startTime` or `endTime` is timestamp. There are some limitations of `startTime` and `endTime`:

- `startTime` must be less than `endTime`.
- `endTime` must be more than now.
- The event duration time (`endTime` - `startTime`) must be more than 10 mins, and less than 100 hours.

**Remark**

To set Remark, You need to set `description` attribute of request object. There are some limitations of `description`:

- Max length of `description` is 300.

**Group**

To set Group, You need to provide an array of group name called `partyTitles`, There are some limitations of `partyTitles`:

- The length of each element must be less than 32

## Create Cloud Event

### Request Parameter

**Input**

Input of a event has serveral options, like `PP PGM`, `PP Slot`, `Grid`, `Upload files`, `Ext IP Source` and `Pack`.

_PP PGM_

To set PP PGM, You need to add an object to `eventInputDto`, like:

```json
{ "purpose": 1, "type": "pgm" }
```

`purpose`: `1` is main input, `2` is backup input

_PP Slot_

To set PP Slot, You need to add an object to `eventInputDto`, like:

```json
{ "purpose": 1, "type": "slot", "value": { "id": "s1", "name": "Slot1" } }
```

slots info: `{Remote Commentator}/production/slots`

_Grid_

To set Grid, You need to add an object to `eventInputDto`, like:

```json
{
  "purpose": 1,
  "type": "vfb",
  "value": {
    "id": "7ab5c27c6b2d8e0b0000000000000001",
    "name": "webteam8E0B_Pack"
  }
}
```

grid list: `{Remote Commentator}/device/pageDevice`

_Upload files_

To set Upload files, You need to add an object to `eventInputDto`, like:

**OTHER SERVICE**, upload files: `/driver/file/query-user-files`

_Ext IP Source_

To set Ext IP Source, You need to add an object to `eventInputDto`, like:

```json
{
  "purpose": 1,
  "type": "ext",
  "value": { "id": "f6644c023a0f43b89b1d97ec487eb1b3", "name": "badapple" }
}
```

ext ip sources: `{Remote Commentator}/user/source/input/pp/page`

_Pack_

To set Pack, You need to add an object to `eventInputDto`, like:

```json
{
  "purpose": 1,
  "type": "pack",
  "value": { "id": "484b3057e36cacb9", "name": "T_ACB9" }
}
```

pack list: `{Remote Commentator}/user/source/output/receiver/page`

**Default Grid**

If you want to set options of "Default Grid", You need create a `output` by Media API, And add a record in `eventOutputDto`, like:

record type is `"ip_out"`, `id` of `value` is the id of output created by Media API. `type` of `value` is `"G"`, `G` is a flag represented "Default Grid".

```json
{
  "type": "ip_out",
  "value": {
    "id": "1585ce88837b46b28e91cae43d0119b9", // media id
    "type": "G"
  }
}
```

**Output**

There are two kinds of output, Receiver and IP OUT. To get Receiver list and IP OUT list, You need to call other API.

Receiver list:

IP OUT list:

**Output Format**

To set Output Format, You need to set `format` attribute of `producerSettingsDto`.

**OTHER SERVICE**, get output format: `/newppapi/user/available-features`

**Elastic IP**

To set Elastic IP, You need to set `elasticIp` attribute of `producerSettingsDto`.

**Region**

To set Region, You need to set `region` attribute of `producerSettingsDto`.

Get region list: `{Remote Commentator}/event/listRegion` 

**Advanced Settings**

_Delay_

To set Delay, You need to set `delay` attribute of `producerSettingsDto`.

_RPS_

To set RPS, You need to set `rps` attribute of `producerSettingsDto`.

_Output Buffer_

To set Output Buffer, You need to set `outputDelay` and `outputDelayTime` attribute of `producerSettingsDto`. like:

```json
{
  //... other attrs
  "outputDelayTime": 166,
  "outputDelay": 1
}
```

_Input Source Recording_

To set Input Source Recording, You need to set `inputSourcesRecord` attribute of `producerSettingsDto`.

_PGM Recording_

To set PGM Recording, You need to set `pgmRecording` attribute of `producerSettingsDto`.

_Replay App_

To set Replay App, You need to set `replayApp` attribute of `producerSettingsDto`.

## Create TVU Transceiver

### Request Parameter

**Receiver**

To set Receiver, You need to set `rid` attribute of request object.

**Input**

To set Input, You need to add an input item to `eventInputDto`, like:

```json
"eventInputDto": [
    {
        "purpose": 7,
        "type": "sdi",
        "value": {
            "id": "822179d5e16c42898b9bc9844e2e5c5a",
            "name": "h"
        }
    }
]
```

## Example

Request body:

```json
{
  "startTime": 1669885751000,
  "endTime": 1669972155000,
  "producerSettingsDto": {
    "replayApp": 0,
    "pgmRecording": 1,
    "rps": 0,
    "outputDelayTime": 0,
    "outputDelay": 0,
    "delay": 2,
    "region": "us-east-1",
    "format": "1080I5994",
    "elasticIp": "",
    "inputSourcesRecord": ""
  },
  "title": "11-30",
  "description": "",
  "record": 1,
  "eventInputDto": [{ "purpose": 1, "type": "pgm" }],
  "eventOutputDto": [
    {
      "type": "receiver",
      "value": {
        "id": "db523f6bdfe70412",
        "name": "Web_pro_R3",
        "type": "R",
        "liveOutputId": ""
      }
    },
    {
      "type": "ip_out",
      "value": {
        "id": "d6da9801dea547b2ad44a236ed303b5d",
        "nickName": "ISSP-共享",
        "createTime": 1660551283489,
        "updateTime": 1666862868004,
        "externalParameters": "{\"streamType\":0}",
        "bitrate": "9645",
        "resolution": "1920x1080",
        "targetId": "commentator",
        "type": "ISSP",
        "userId": "b144b461b7e9459ca778c4ce87e72fea",
        "deleteFlag": 0,
        "importType": "output",
        "authType": "0",
        "isCrop": null,
        "pushTime": "1666862697787",
        "subType": null,
        "living": false,
        "rid": null,
        "autoResolution": 0,
        "rtmpUrl": null,
        "audioTrackMap": null,
        "pushing": false,
        "isGoLive": false,
        "otherSharing": false,
        "isSelfAccount": true,
        "ipUrl": "",
        "selected": true,
        "disabled": false,
        "name": "ISSP-共享"
      }
    }
  ],
  "mainWindowType": 1,
  "platform": 0,
  "rid": "",
  "errorTips": false,
  "partyTitles": ["g"]
}
```

**Return example**

```json
{
  "errorInfo": "OK",
  "errorCode": "0x0",
  "result": {
    "id": "e07595ec5b2d45b386abcf71f24425d0",
    "eventPartyList": [{ "partyCode": 617706304287, "title": "g" }]
  },
  "repeated": null
}
```
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://remote-commentator.p.rapidapi.com/event/v2/create"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "remote-commentator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Update Event
api_list.description:
**Brief description:**

- Update Event

**Request URL：**

- POST `/event/v2/update/{id}`

**Parameter:**

| Parameter name  | Required | Type   | Explain                      |
| :-------------- | :------- | :----- | ---------------------------- |
| rid             | NO       | String | Receiver peerId              |
| startTime       | NO       | long   | start time                   |
| endTime         | NO       | long   | end time                     |
| region          | NO       | String | region from / listRegion 32  |
| title           | No       | String | title 128                    |
| description     | No       | String | description 256              |
| partyWithTitles | No       | array  | current partyCode with title |

**Add New Parameter:**

| Parameter name | Required | Type   | Explain               |
| :------------- | :------- | :----- | --------------------- |
| sourceType     | Yes      | int    | 1:grid VFB 2:file     |
| fileId         | Yes      | String | fileId                |
| fileName       | Yes      | String | fileName              |
| record         | Yes      | int    | 0:not record 1:record |

**Request example**

```json
{
  "startTime": 1669882937000,
  "endTime": 1670055740000,
  "producerSettingsDto": {
    "region": "us-east-1",
    "format": "1080I5994",
    "elasticIp": "",
    "delay": 2,
    "isVertical": 0,
    "rps": 0,
    "replayApp": 0,
    "outputDelay": 0,
    "outputDelayTime": 0,
    "cloudRecord": 0,
    "recordSources": "",
    "pgmRecording": 1
  },
  "title": "11-30",
  "description": "",
  "record": 1,
  "eventInputDto": [{ "purpose": 1, "type": "pgm", "value": null }],
  "eventOutputDto": [],
  "mainWindowType": 1,
  "platform": 0,
  "rid": null,
  "errorTips": false,
  "eventParties": [{ "partyCode": 656437086815, "title": "gg" }]
}
```

**Return example**

```json
{
  "errorInfo": "OK",
  "errorCode": "0x0",
  "result": {
    "id": "40d453981089485fb24d4bf251f131ee",
    "eventPartyList": [{ "partyCode": 656437086815, "title": "gg" }]
  },
  "repeated": null
}
```

api_list.name: Delete Event
api_list.description:
**Brief description:**

- Delete Event

**Request URL：**

- POST `/event/v2/delete/{id}`

  **Return example**

```json
{
  "errorCode": "0x0",
  "errorInfo": "Success",
  "result": null
}
```

api_list.name: Get Ext IP Source
api_list.description:
**Request URL：**

- POST `/user/source/input/pp/page`

## Parameters

| Parameter name | Required | Type   | Explain                    |
| :------------- | :------- | :----- | -------------------------- |
| pageNum        | Y        | int    | page number, starting at 1 |
| pageSize       | Y        | int    | amount of data per page    |
| condition      | N        | String | condition                  |
| sourceType     | Y        | int    | sourceType                 |

## Examples

```json
{
  "pageNum": 1,
  "pageSize": 20,
  "sourceType": 2,
  "condition": ""
}
```

_Response_

```json
{
  "errorInfo": "OK",
  "errorCode": "0x0",
  "result": {
    "total": 0,
    "list": [],
    "pageNum": 1,
    "pageSize": 0,
    "size": 0,
    "startRow": 0,
    "endRow": 0,
    "pages": 0,
    "prePage": 0,
    "nextPage": 0,
    "isFirstPage": true,
    "isLastPage": true,
    "hasPreviousPage": false,
    "hasNextPage": false,
    "navigatePages": 8,
    "navigatepageNums": [],
    "navigateFirstPage": 0,
    "navigateLastPage": 0,
    "firstPage": 0,
    "lastPage": 0
  },
  "repeated": null
}
```
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://remote-commentator.p.rapidapi.com/user/source/input/pp/page"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "remote-commentator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
